1497.question: How is performance measured?

7-Table1-1.png: The performance of the models is measured using the area under the curve (AUC) and their 95% confidence intervals.
7-Figure3-1.png: Performance is measured by the ROC curve. All lines share similar trends, with line 1 being the most consistent and line 4 being the least consistent.

1497.answer: they use ROC curves and cross-validation
